mapper.select: SELECT a.id,a.userId,a.totalAward,a.award,a.context, DATE_FORMAT(a.createTime,"%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s")AS createTime,a.headPic, a.userName,a.skipAppid,a.skipUrl,a.shareUrl,a.wxchat_mark,a.pre_image,a.tweet,a.tweet_title, a.job_type,b.nickName,b.avatarUrl FROM beg_job a LEFT JOIN admin b ON a.userId = b.userId WHERE id = #{id} AND a.totalAward >= a.award
SELECT a.id,a.userId,a.totalAward,a.award,a.context, DATE_FORMAT(a.createTime,"%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s")AS createTime,a.headPic, a.userName,a.skipAppid,a.skipUrl,a.shareUrl FROM beg_job a WHERE id = #{id}

SELECT a.id, a.userId, a.totalAward, a.award, a.alreadyAward, a.totalCount, a.alreadyCount, a.context, DATE_FORMAT( a.createTime, "%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s" ) AS createTime, TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND,createTime,NOW()) AS timeLimit, a.state, a.headPic, a.title, a.userName, a.skipAppid, a.skipUrl, a.shareUrl, a.transaction_id FROM beg_job a WHERE id = #{id} AND state IN (1,4) AND a.totalAward >= a.award
mapper.update: UPDATE beg_job SET alreadyAward = alreadyAward + #{award},alreadyCount = alreadyCount +1,VERSION = VERSION + 1 WHERE id = #{id} AND state != 0 AND VERSION = #{version} AND totalCount > alreadyCount
mapper.select: SELECT IF(a.totalCount IS NULL,0,a.totalCount) AS totalCount,IF(b.totalAward IS NULL,0,b.totalAward) AS totalAward FROM (SELECT COUNT(1) AS totalCount FROM beg_job WHERE userId = #{0} ) a, (SELECT IF(SUM(award) IS NULL,0,SUM(award)) totalAward FROM beg_job_record LEFT JOIN beg_job bj ON jobId=id WHERE bj.userId = #{0}) b

SELECT IF(a.totalCount IS NULL,0,a.totalCount) AS totalCount,IF(b.totalAward IS NULL,0,b.totalAward) AS totalAward FROM (SELECT COUNT(1) AS totalCount FROM beg_job_record WHERE userId = #{0} ) a, (SELECT SUM(award) AS totalAward FROM beg_job WHERE id = ANY(SELECT jobId FROM beg_job_record WHERE userId = #{0} ) ) b

SELECT id,userId,totalAward,award,alreadyAward,totalCount,alreadyCount,context,timeLimit,DATE_FORMAT(createTime,"%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s")AS createTime, state,transaction_id FROM beg_job WHERE timeLimit*24*60-1-TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE,createTime,NOW()) < 0 AND state = 1 AND timeLimit != 0

SELECT id,userId,totalAward,award,alreadyAward,totalCount,alreadyCount,context,timeLimit,DATE_FORMAT(createTime,"%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s")AS createTime,state FROM beg_job WHERE TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE,NOW(),createTime) <6 AND state = 4 AND takePush = 0
mapper.update: UPDATE beg_job SET takePush = 1 WHERE id = #{id}
